import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; import "./contact.css"; const Contact = () => { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_1plnv3q', 'template_3rjpix8', form.current, 'LBk5SKyWXYdOG7l1W') e.target.reset () }; return (
